item.title: Socratic Seminar - AssumeUTXO
item.description: Reading list: https://gist.github.com/michaelfolkson/f46a7085af59b2e7b9a79047155c3993 Intros Michael Folkson (MF): This is a discussion on AssumeUTXO. We are lucky to have James O’Beirne on the call. There is a reading list that I will share in a second with a bunch of links going right from concept, some of the podcasts James has done, a couple of presentations James has done. And then towards the end hopefully we will get pretty technical and in the weeds of some of the current, past and future PRs.
